name: macos-mcp-server
description: A production-ready MCP server for deep macOS integration (Notes, Reminders, Calendar, Contacts, Messages)

scripts.playground:dev: pnpm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node dist/index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test && pnpm run build
scripts.release: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test && pnpm run build && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test && pnpm run build && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test && pnpm run build && npm version major && git push && git push --tags
